title: September 27, 20103PM
content:
Todayâ€™s guest is Eric J. <!--more--> Weiner and he has covered business and economics issues for fifteen years as a writer and editor.
He is a former columnist and reporter for Dow Jones Newswires, and he has written for The Wall Street Journal, Los Angeles Times, The Boston Globe, The Village Voice, and countless other major publications.
He also is a contributor to the news and opinion website The Huffington Post.
He lives in Great Barrington, Massachusetts, with his wife, Paige, and their son, Jake.
